properties.entry: update sc_purchase_supplier_inquiry set IS_USED = '1' WHERE SUPPLIER_ID = '{@#supplierId#}' and SKU = '{@#sku#}' and plan_id = '{@#planId#}'

SELECT spsi.* , ss.NAME, ss.ID AS SUP_ID FROM sc_supplier ss, sc_real_product_supplier srps LEFT JOIN sc_purchase_supplier_inquiry spsi ON srps.REAL_SKU = spsi.SKU AND srps.SUPPLIER_ID = spsi.SUPPLIER_ID AND spsi.PLAN_ID = '{@#planId#}' WHERE srps.REAL_SKU = '{@#sku#}' AND ss.ID = srps.SUPPLIER_ID {@ and srps.supplier_id = '#supplierId#'}

INSERT INTO sc_purchase_supplier_inquiry ( ID, SUPPLIER_ID, SKU, ASIN, PLAN_ID, CYCLE, PACKAGE, PAYMENT, NUMBER_OFFER, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, STATUS, MEMO, URL, IMAGE, PRODUCT_SIZE, PACKAGE_SIZE, PACKINGS_PECIFICATIONS ) VALUES ( '{@#id#}', '{@#supplierId#}', '{@#sku#}', '{@#asin#}', '{@#planId#}', '{@#cycle#}', '{@#package#}', '{@#payment#}', '{@#numberOffer#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW(), '{@#status#}', '{@#memo#}', '{@#url#}', '{@#image#}', '{@#productSize#}', '{@#packageSize#}', '{@#packingSpecifications#}' )
